org.pepstock.charba.client.data

Class GaugeDataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.JavaScriptObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.data.Dataset
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.data.PieDataset
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.data.DoughnutDataset
            • org.pepstock.charba.client.data.MeterDataset
              • org.pepstock.charba.client.data.GaugeDataset

  • public final class GaugeDataset
extends MeterDataset
    The Gauge chart allows a number of properties to be specified for each dataset. These are used to set display properties for a specific dataset.
    Is equals of Meter dataset.
    The minimum value of data is 0 (see MeterDataset.MINIMUM_VALUE).
    The dataset will have always 2 data and setting the color of data (set by thresholds), only the first is the empty value.
    To set the data, is mandatory to use MeterDataset.setValue(double)) method instead of Dataset.setData(double...)) one.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
    See Also:
    MeterDataset
